name: Barber Shop Hair Cut Games 3D
description:
Barber shop for men is for those who dreamed to make stylish hair cutting styles in New York City! Do you want to have stylish hair styles from hair salon of town? Spice up your hair styles with barber shop for boys! Get ready for exciting day at work with hair cutting in barber shop! Make a good impression so that customers will keep coming back for more! Run own hair salon and help boys look perfect after makeover from barber shop!

If you ever dreamed to make stylish haircuts, then this hair salon game is for you! Try on the image of a barbarian and perform hair cutting, hair style and have fun playing barber shop game! Customers don't just want hair shaved off also give them perfect hair cut that makes them look and feel like a real man. Work as a pro barbarian with a sharp blade and steady hand! Take clients into your hair salon and create stylish hair look. Cut and style hairs, using your creativity in barber shop. World’s most famous hair dresser is waiting for you to give crazy hair cut in hair salon game!

As you progress through the levels, hair cutting job gets harder, the time gets shorter and the hair cutting styles get trickier! So get ready for the real barber shop challenges!

Features:
• Challenging hair salon game levels!
• Various hair tools like trimmers, scissor, comb, electric razor & much more!
• Chance to become a real barber & show your creativity!
• Attractive gameplay and sound effects!

Download barber shop game and give us your feedback, so we can make more new barber shop haircut games for you.
